background: Nadine El Sayed leads DMC’s factual and documentary commissioning within United Media Services. She seeks accessible, inspirational projects blending heritage, identity and youth engagement, aligned with Egypt’s national cultural strategy.
thematic_priorities: Heritage, music, crafts and Egyptian lifestyle
Youth, innovation and positive social change
content_not_wanted: Overly critical or politically sensitive projects
technical_requirements: Visual decks and creative treatments preferred
current_calls: Heritage and lifestyle profiles with positive narratives
submission_process: One-pager or visual deck in Arabic
name: Nadine El Sayed
